overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging an audience of over 3,500 followers. His content primarily focuses on research and discussions related to computational social science and disinformation studies, achieving a moderate level of engagement across all platforms.

contentThemes.description: Updates on new research papers, grants, and projects
Job openings and research opportunities in computational social science
Announcements of upcoming conferences and presentations on disinformation

recommendations: Increase visual content such as infographics or images to enhance post visibility and engagement.
Engage more with followers by responding to comments and encouraging discussions to build a community.

platformInsights.mastodon: Content related to methodological discussions on disinformation shows lower engagement compared to more concrete research updates.
platformInsights.linkedin: Posts about new research grants and job opportunities receive higher engagement, indicating interest in professional development content.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
